definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Hareton grew black as a thunder cloud, at this childish speech.
sentences.chinese: 哈里顿听了这一套孩子气的话，脸像阴云一般黑。

sentences.english: You should not behave childishly at your age.
sentences.chinese: 在你这个年龄做事不应该孩子气。

sentences.english: That was sort of a juvie thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 干出那种事似乎有些孩子气。

sentences.english: He didn't care her childishness and continue say of patience.
sentences.chinese: 他没有在意她的孩子气，继续耐心的说。

sentences.english: Perhaps you will be angry, i was kind of childishness.
sentences.chinese: 也许你会很生气，我有点孩子气。

sentences.english: My dear child, you're being childish.
sentences.chinese: 我的乖孩子，你这是孩子气。

sentences.english: Of course, this just makes her look more childish.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这个动作只会让她看起来更加孩子气。

sentences.english: Don't be so childish if you think you can get something for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 别这么孩子气，如果你认为你能够不劳而获。

sentences.english: Yeah, it turns out the nation's mental-health leaders act like children.
sentences.chinese: 原来这个国家的精神健康的先驱们这么孩子气。

sentences.english: Grace, one of her colleagues, thinks that Elle is very childish.
sentences.chinese: 艾莉的同事格蕾斯觉得艾莉太孩子气了。

sentences.english: A: Behave yourself, Tom. Don’t be so childish.
sentences.chinese: 规矩点儿，汤姆，别这么孩子气。

sentences.english: What we need to learn from children isn't childish.
sentences.chinese: 我们要从孩子身上学的并非是孩子气。

sentences.english: There even remained in his remoter crannies some relics of the boy.
sentences.chinese: 从某些细微之处还隐约可见他还保留着几分孩子气。

sentences.english: I like him all the more because he is so childish.
sentences.chinese: 正因为他有孩子气我更加喜欢他。

sentences.english: Shaped out of great lumps of muck by childish gods.
sentences.chinese: 定是被孩子气的神灵用泥巴塑造。

sentences.english: And, after all, dear What is idle prattle for?
sentences.chinese: 而且，亲爱的，整天说些孩子气的话有什么用。

definition: to act like a spoiled child/to throw a tantrum/to act coquettishly
to make trouble without reason (idiom); to be deliberately provocative
